attrib:
RADIUS: 330
DAMAGE: 40 / 80 / 120 / 160
DAMAGE PER CREEP: 14 / 16 / 18 / 20
DAMAGE PER HERO: 20 / 35 / 50 / 65
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 25%
DURATION: 7
BONUS SPEED (CREEPS): 3%
BONUS SPEED (HEROES): 9%
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/100/100/100
COOLDOWN: 18
desc: Turns the enemies numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.
lore: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
name: legion_commander_overwhelming_odds

attrib:
DURATION: 5
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 60 / 80 / 100 / 120
HP REGEN: 30 / 40 / 50 / 60
cmb:
MANA COST: 110
COOLDOWN: 16/15/14/13
desc: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.
lore: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.
name: legion_commander_press_the_attack

cmb: COOLDOWN: 0.9
desc: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately attack again with bonus lifesteal.
lore: Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.
name: legion_commander_moment_of_courage

cmb:
MANA COST: 75/75/75
COOLDOWN: 50
desc: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.
lore: To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.
name: legion_commander_duel
